import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-eventos', templateUrl: './eventos.component.html', styleUrls: ['./eventos.component.scss'] }) export class EventosComponent { public eventos: any = []; larguraImagem: number = 50; margemImagem: number = 2; mostarImagem: boolean = true; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.getEventos(); } public getEventos(): void { this.http.get('https://localhost:5001/api/eventos').subscribe( response => this.eventos = response, error => console.log(error) ); } }
